page.title: 06GOVERNMENT IN CORHAMPTON
page.content: This area is in the parishes of Exton to the north east, Corhampton to the south, Upham to the west and Bishops Waltham to the south west. Exton is so small numerically that it only merits a Parish Meeting not an elected council.Its only official is the Chairman and holds only 2 meetings per year. Corhampton ,Bishops Waltham and Upham have elected Parish Councillors. The area is under the jurisdiction of the Winchester City District Council (Upper Meon Valley Ward) and the Hampshire County Council (Meon Valley Ward) and the Winchester Parliamentary Constituency.
